 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

org.slf4j
接口 Logger

所有已知实现类：
LoggerImpl
public interface Logger

The org.slf4j.Logger interface is the main user entry point of SLF4J API. It is expected that logging takes place through concrete implementations of this interface.

Typical usage pattern:

 import org.slf4j.Logger;
 import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
 
 public class Wombat {

   final static Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Wombat.class);
   Integer t;
   Integer oldT;

   public void setTemperature(Integer temperature) {
     oldT = t;        
     t = temperature;
     logger.debug("Temperature set to {}. Old temperature was {}.", t, oldT);
     if(temperature.intValue() > 50) {
       logger.info("Temperature has risen above 50 degrees.");
     }
   }
 }

作者：
Ceki Gülcü

static String ROOT_LOGGER_NAME
          Case insensitive String constant used to retrieve the name of the root logger.

字段详细信息

ROOT_LOGGER_NAME

static final String ROOT_LOGGER_NAME
Case insensitive String constant used to retrieve the name of the root logger.

从以下版本开始：
1.3
另请参见：
常量字段值
方法详细信息

getName

String getName()
Return the name of this Logger instance.

isTraceEnabled

boolean isTraceEnabled()
Is the logger instance enabled for the TRACE level?

返回：
True if this Logger is enabled for the TRACE level, false otherwise.
从以下版本开始：
1.4

trace

void trace(String msg)
Log a message at the TRACE level.

参数：
msg - the message string to be logged
从以下版本开始：
1.4

trace

void trace(String format,
           Object arg)
Log a message at the TRACE level according to the specified format and argument.

This form avoids superfluous object creation when the logger is disabled for the TRACE level.

参数：
format - the format string
arg - the argument
从以下版本开始：
1.4

trace

void trace(String format,
           Object arg1,
           Object arg2)
Log a message at the TRACE level according to the specified format and arguments.

This form avoids superfluous object creation when the logger is disabled for the TRACE level.

参数：
format - the format string
arg1 - the first argument
arg2 - the second argument
从以下版本开始：
1.4

trace

void trace(String format,
           Object[] argArray)
Log a message at the TRACE level according to the specified format and arguments.

This form avoids superfluous object creation when the logger is disabled for the TRACE level.

参数：
format - the format string
argArray - an array of arguments
从以下版本开始：
1.4

trace

void trace(String msg,
           Throwable t)
Log an exception (throwable) at the TRACE level with an accompanying message.

参数：
msg - the message accompanying the exception
t - the exception (throwable) to log
从以下版本开始：
1.4

isDebugEnabled

boolean isDebugEnabled()
Is the logger instance enabled for the DEBUG level?

返回：
True if this Logger is enabled for the DEBUG level, false otherwise.

argArray - an array of arguments

debug

void debug(String msg,
           Throwable t)
Log an exception (throwable) at the DEBUG level with an accompanying message.

参数：
msg - the message accompanying the exception
t - the exception (throwable) to log
